title: Global Biostatistical Commons
text:
Glossary & Definitions
Get a quick orientation to core biostatistical ideas and terminology.
Tutorials & Examples
Short, applied examples with code (regression models, survival analysis, longitudinal data).
Common Challenges
Notes on frequent issues in practice (e.g. power, convergence, model checking, missing data).
Foundational Papers
Links to foundational biostatistical papers (e.g. on double robustness, inverse weighting).
Publishing Guidelines
Instructions for publishing in biostatistical journals (e.g. Statistics in Medicine, Biometrika).
External Resources
Interactive apps, workshop materials, videos and blogposts, and other selected external links.

title: Global Biostatistical Commons
text:
Who this site is for

Students and trainees looking for approachable explanations and code examples

Collaborators and researchers who want quick references and practical guidance

Instructors and supervisors seeking materials to share in courses, labs, or journal clubs

title: Global Biostatistical Commons
text:
Contribute
The Commons is designed to grow through community contributions.
If you have:

a short tutorial or worked example,
an interactive app or teaching demo, or
a particularly clear paper, video, or set of notes,

please consider contributing.

Contact: email@uwaterloo.ca
